command.text: declare @name_M_ds_tk_2ve nvarchar(512), @name_M_ds_tk_cn_1ve nvarchar(512), @name_M_ds_tk_ctr nvarchar(512), @val1 nvarchar(512), @val2 nvarchar(512), @val3 nvarchar(512), @message nvarchar(4000) select @name_M_ds_tk_2ve = name, @val1 = val from options where name = 'M_ds_tk_2ve' select @name_M_ds_tk_cn_1ve = name, @val2 = val from options where name = 'M_ds_tk_cn_1ve' select @name_M_ds_tk_ctr = name, @val3 = val from options where name = 'M_ds_tk_ctr' select @message = 'this._name_M_ds_tk_2ve = ''' + rtrim(@name_M_ds_tk_2ve) + '''; this._name_M_ds_tk_cn_1ve = ''' + rtrim(@name_M_ds_tk_cn_1ve) + '''; this._name_M_ds_tk_ctr = ''' + rtrim(@name_M_ds_tk_ctr) + '''; this._val1 = ''' + rtrim(@val1) + '''; this._val2 = ''' + rtrim(@val2) + '''; this._val3 = ''' + rtrim(@val3) + ''';loadFormFilter(this);' select @message as message return
